purpleculture_pinyin:
qián
hidden; secret; latent; to hide; to conceal; to submerge; to dive
скрытый; секрет; скрытый; прятаться; скрыть; погрузиться в воду; нырять
rtega_mnemonic:
潛潛RS
潜潜		濳hide, hidden, secret, latent, submerge, dive
  • two men under the sun 朁/替/㬱 lost in the water 氵: they are hidden or submerged or diving
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 潜)
Antonyms: 浮
Pictophonetic: 朁 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
潛力 [ qián lì ]: potential; capacity
潛在 [ qián zài ]: hidden; potential; latent
潛艇 [ qián tǐng ]: submarine
潛心 [ qián xīn ]: to concentrate fully on sth; single-minded
潛能 [ qián néng ]: potential; hidden capability
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 朁 [ cǎn ] if, supposing, nevertheless
heisig_chinese_memo: When a submarine or similar vessels submerges an exchange of air for water takes place, just like a day exchange of husbands and wives, and the two wives are two waitresses to make it funnier like on those reality TV shows.
Ru_trainchinese:
qián: (глаг) погружаться под воду, нырять
qián: (графема) скрытый, потенциальный; скрывать, прятать; скрытно, тайком
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When a submarine or similar vessels submerges an exchange of air for water takes place, just like an exchange of husbands for a day like on those reality TV shows.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "朁", the original meaning is wading. "Shuowen": "Wade in the water. One said: Zangye. One said: Han water is the diving. From the water, the sound." "Poetry·Xiaoya·Zhengyue": "Fish lies in the marsh, and it is also a bandit; Although latent is lurking, it is also the hole of the hole."

" Latent " can mean concealment and hiding. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Heming": "The potential of the fish is in the deep sea, or in Zhu."

" Hidden " also means undercurrent. Xie Wuliang "Xihu Lvxing Sends Huaibo's First Fifty Rhymes": "Holding the ancients and cherishing the truth, the tears and sorrows are hidden."

" Diving " also means detection. "Zhuangzi‧ Tian Zifang": "Look up to the blue sky, dive down to the Huangquan." Guo Qingfan's narration: "Diving and peeping correspond to the text. Diving, testing. It is similar to the meaning of peeping. The ancient teachings are about testing, see "Er Ya". "
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "朁", the original meaning is wading.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「朁」聲，本義為涉水。《說文》：「涉水也。一曰：藏也。一曰：漢水爲潛。从水，朁聲。」《詩‧小雅‧正月》：「魚在于沼，亦匪克樂；潛雖伏矣，亦孔之炤。」

　　「潛」可表示隱蔽、隱藏。《詩‧小雅‧鶴鳴》：「魚潛在淵，或在于渚。」

　　「潛」也表示暗流。謝無量〈西湖旅興寄懷伯先五十韻〉：「弔古懷彌切，緘憂淚欲潛。」

　　「潛」還表示探測。《莊子‧田子方》：「上闚青天，下潛黃泉。」郭慶藩集釋：「潛與闚對文。潛，測也。與闚之意相近。古訓潛為測，見《爾雅》。」

English Definition: hidden; secret; latent; to hide; to conceal; to submerge; to dive
Antonyms: 浮

Pictophonetic: 朁 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.

    • 朁 [ cǎn ] if, supposing, nevertheless

潛艇 [ qián tǐng ]: submarine

從「 水 」，「 朁 」聲，本義為涉水。《說文》：「涉水也。一曰：藏也。一曰：漢水爲潛。从水，朁聲。」《詩‧小雅‧正月》：「魚在于沼，亦匪克樂；潛雖伏矣，亦孔之炤。」 「 潛 」可表示隱蔽、隱藏。《詩‧小雅‧鶴鳴》：「魚潛在淵，或在于渚。」 「 潛 」也表示暗流。謝無量〈西湖旅興寄懷伯先五十韻〉：「弔古懷彌切，緘憂淚欲潛。」 「 潛 」還表示探測。《莊子‧田子方》：「上闚青天，下潛黃泉。」郭慶藩集釋：「潛與闚對文。潛，測也。與闚之意相近。古訓潛為測，見《爾雅》。」
From the sound of " water" and " 朁", the original meaning is wading. "Shuowen": "Wade in the water. One said: Zangye. One said: Han water is the diving. From the water, the sound." "Poetry·Xiaoya·Zhengyue": "Fish lies in the marsh, and it is also a bandit; Although latent is lurking, it is also the hole of the hole." " Latent" can mean concealment and hiding. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Heming": "The potential of the fish is in the deep sea, or in Zhu." " Hidden" also means undercurrent. Xie Wuliang "Xihu Lvxing Sends Huaibo's First Fifty Rhymes": "Holding the ancients and cherishing the truth, the tears and sorrows are hidden." " Diving" also means detection. "Zhuangzi‧ Tian Zifang": "Look up to the blue sky, dive down to the Huangquan." Guo Qingfan's narration: "Diving and peeping correspond to the text. Diving, testing. It is similar to the meaning of peeping. The ancient teachings are about testing, see "Er Ya". "

潛字的基本解释

潛
qián
同“潜”。

潛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》昨鹽切，平鹽，從。］
［《廣韻》慈豔切，去豔，從。］
“漸3”的被通假字。亦作“濳1”。亦作“潜1”。
(1)涉水；没水游渡。
(2)隐藏；隐蔽。
(3)秘密；暗中。
(4)暗流。
(5)深；沉。
(6)深处。
(7)测；探测。
(8)专一。
(9)见“潛潛”。
(10)通“糝”、“橬”、“罧”。鱼止息处。
(11)水名。汉水支流，即今湖北省潜江县东南部的芦洑河。
(12)水名。嘉陵江支流，即今四川省的渠江。
(13)水名。源出安徽省岳西县西北，南流至潜山县入皖河。
(14)春秋时鲁地名。当在今山东省济宁市西南喻屯一带。
(15)春秋时楚邑名。在今安徽省霍山县东北。
(16)姓。宋有潜说友。见宋周密《癸辛杂识别集·潜说友》。

潛字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潛； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第09
【唐韻】昨鹽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】慈鹽切，?音?。【說文】涉水也。【揚子·方言】潛涵，沉也。又游也。【註】潛行水中，亦曰游。　又藏也。【易·乾卦】陽氣潛藏。　又【爾雅·釋言】潛，深也。【詩·小雅】潛雖伏矣。　又漢水之別名。【爾雅·釋水】水自江出爲沱，漢爲潛。【書·禹貢】沱潛旣道。　又丘名。【爾雅·釋丘】晉有潛丘。　又地名。【春秋·隱二年】公會戎于潛。　又邑名。【史記·楚世家】吳取楚之六潛。　又潛江，縣名。【廣輿記】屬安陸府。　又牛名。【酉陽雜俎】句漏縣大江中有潛牛。　又姓。宋安撫使潛說友。　又【小爾雅】魚之所息謂之潛。【詩·周頌】潛有多魚。【傳】潛，糝也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?慈艷切，音?。義同。一曰伏流。

潛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潛字的起名意思

暂无。

latent
Basic explanation of words
latent
qián
Same as "hidden".
latent
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" salt cut yesterday, flat salt, from. ]
["Guangyun" Ci Yan cut, go to Yan, from. ]
"Gradually 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "Yi 1". Also known as "Qian 1".
(1) Wading; swimming without water.
(2) Hidden; concealed.
(3) Secret; secretly.
(4) Undercurrent.
(5) Deep; heavy.
(6) Deep.
(7) Measurement; detection.
(8) Single-mindedness.
(9) See "Qianqian".
(10) Through "炁", "橬", "罧". Where the fish stops.
(11) The name of the water. A tributary of the Han River, which is now the Luwei River in the southeast of Qianjiang County, Hubei Province.
(12) The name of the water. A tributary of the Jialing River, which is now the Qujiang River in Sichuan Province.
(13) The name of the water. It originates from the northwest of Yuexi County in Anhui Province and flows south to Qianshan County and enters the Wanhe River.
(14) Lu place names in the Spring and Autumn Period. It was in the Yutun area, southwest of Jining City, Shandong Province.
(15) The name of Chuyi in the Spring and Autumn Period. In today's northeast of Huoshan County, Anhui Province.
(16) Last name. Song Youqian said friends. See Song Zhoumi's "The Recognition Collection of Gui Xin Za · Qian Shuo You".
latent
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Qian; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: Page 649 09
[Tang Yun] Salt cut yesterday [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Kindly cut salt, "yin". [Said the text] Wading also. [Yangtze Dialect] Hidden connotation, Shen Ye. Swim again. [Note] Diving in the water is also called swimming.　Hidden again. [Yi·Qian Gua] Yang Qi is hidden.　[Erya·Interpretation] Dive, deep. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Although it is hidden.　Also the alias of Hanshui. 【Erya·Shishui】Water comes from the river as tuo, and the Han as submerged. [Book·Yugong] Tuo Qiangdao.　Also the name of the hill. [Erya Shiqiu] Qianqiu is promoted.　Also place name. [Spring and Autumn·Hidden Years] Guild Rong Yuqian.　Also known as the town. 【Historical Records·Chu Family】Wu takes the six potentials of Chu.　 Qianjiang again, the name of the county. [Guang Yu Ji] belongs to Anlu Mansion.　Also name. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】There are potential cows in the rivers of Juleu County.　Another last name. Song Anfu makes Qian talk to friends.　[Xiao Erya] The rest of the fish is called potential. [Poetry·Song of Zhou] There are many fishes hidden. [Biography] Qiang, grits too.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ci Yan cut, sound?. The same meaning. One said Fuliu.
